info.title: Operate a collapsed disclosure button in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the first disclosure button
testPageDocument.querySelector('button[aria-controls="faq1_desc"]').focus();

user: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, set the state of the button to expanded.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, set the state of the button to expanded.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to expanded) is conveyed
